subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Touchdown: Super Bowl meets Super Tuesday

04/13/07 12:06 PM, EDT
Drink beer, eat candy, buy a car. Now add a new pitch to next year's lineup of Super Bowl television ads: Vote for me.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
U.S. and China trade war fears 'overblown'
Commerce Secretary says that recent suits filed against China doesn't mean the economic giants are headed for a trade war.
04/13/07 12:03 PM, EDT
Worries that recent U.S. trade actions against China signal an impending trade war between the two countries are "way overblown," Commerce Secretary Carlos Gutierrez said on Friday.
FULL STORY
